thread.title: Telegraph Summer Beauty Box for only £19.99
thread.title_full: Telegraph Summer Beauty Box for only £19.99 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Telegraph Summer Beauty Box for only £19.99
text: The Telegraph Summer Beauty Box offers a collection of skin care products to liven and tone your skin this summer, plus a selection of beauty treats to refresh your summer looks.The Telegraph Summer Beauty Box includes: Cowshed - Wild Body Invigorating Body Lotion (300ml) RRP: £20 Enjoy this invigorating blend of essential oils of lemongrass to refresh, ginger to improve vitality, and rosemary to sharpen the mind. Fake Bake – The Face Anti-aging Self Tanning Lotion with Matrixyl 3000® (60ml) RRP: £22 The Face is a sheer self-tan lotion with specialist ingredient Matrixyl 3000® to promote collagen production for younger skin and a healthy glow. Elemis Pro-Intense Daily Lotion (10ml) RRP: £22 Its unique bio-complex of high-tech nature and plant stem cells helps to improve tone and texture, promoting a firmer jawline and taut cheeks. Eyeko Mascara / Jet Black (8ml) RRP: £15 Award-winning lengthening mascara that lengthens, extends and separates your lashes likes no other. Pure eye drama. Ciaté The Glossip Nail Polish (13.5ml) RRP: £9 Vibrant peachy coral for that tutti frutti summer feeling to add a little sunshine to your day. Bellapierre Mineral Lip Stick Sassy RRP: £20 Bellapierre’s luxurious mineral lipstick delivers moisturising colour that stays with the mineral pigments providing natural protection from the sun. How to claim: See the newspaper on Saturday, July 18, 2014 for details of how to claim and for terms and conditions. *£4.99 postage and packaging payable. Follow @telegraph
